dmca.title: Copyright Infringement re hopenow.info
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Don Stone [mailto:onroute@onroute.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 07, 2005 2:59 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement re hopenow.info

Mr. Lance Crosby, COO
ThePlanet.com Internet Services Inc.
1333 Stemmons Freeway,
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207

Dear Mr. Crosby:

I am writing to you to request that ThePlanet.com immediately remove the
plagiarized web site www.hopenow.com from your servers.

We have discovered that this web site, operated by a Zhang Pingtao, has
copied the entire contents and style of our extensive travel web
site: www.onroute.com. Onroute.com, which I own, has been in existence since
February 1996. I have information that this is not the only infraction of
this type that has been reported to you.

Zhang Pingtao's address is 1550 Washington Street, San Juan, Puerto Rico.
His e-mail address is<mailto:copehope@awab.com> copehope@awab.com, and the
telephone number listed in whois is 
+1.12022838899.

I have a good faith belief that use of this material, including the design
of the Onroute.com web site, and the use of the name Fraser Bridges on the
"about" page, is not authorized by myself, or any agent, or the law..

The material on Onroute.com is under copyright. Much of the material
contained in the  web site is taken from eight travel guidebooks, which I
have written under my pen name, Fraser Bridges. These books were written
between 1989 and 1996. Material from the books were then placed in the
Onroute.com web site.

The books are:
Alaska-Yukon Adventures, Pacific Coast Adventures, Rocky Mountain
Adventures, Southwest Adventures, British Columbia Adventures, Natural
Places of the Southwest, Natural Places of the Northwest, and Natural Places
of Texas and the Gulf Coast. I retained all electronic publishing rights to
these books, all but one were published by Prima Publishing. British
Columbia Adventures was self published.

The information in this notification is accurate and under penalty of
perjury, that I, as the sole owner of Onroute Communications,  am authorized
to act in this matter as the owner of an exclusive right that has been
infringed.

This notification is request the immediate removal of this copied
(stolen) web site, or to completely disable access to the infringing
material, and to ensure that this site bears no resemblance to Onroute.com.
Should this action not take place, we will undertake legal action to ensure
that there is a satisfactory solution to this serious, illegal infraction.

I have attached a word document containing the above notification.

Thank you for your cooperation.



Donald C. Stone
Owner-Manager, On-Route Communications


On-Route Communications
P.O. Box 1508 Jackson, CA 95642
209-257-1903 -- <mailto:onroute@onroute.com>onroute@onroute.com
